thread.title: Annette Briggs
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Annette Briggs

author: Annette Briggs
title: Annette Briggs
text:
I too was like most people not very knowledgeable about solar engergy and especially the technical details which is so clearly explained by Finn.
You are so generous with your time and expertise. May you be blessed for sharing your knowledge and keeping things simple and easy to understand. I know you cannot reply to all emails but I would be happy if you can respond to some of our questions or perhaps give us some feedback on the Quote: we would like to go with. A second opinion is worth even more to your audience.
